scripts.compile: tsc -p packages/service-registry-redis && tsc -p packages/electron-build-server && tsc -p packages/router
scripts.//: REDIS_ENDPOINT and ELECTRON_BUILD_SERVICE_PORT (443 by default, so, on a local machine set to 8443) envs are required
scripts.start-docker: docker run --mount type=tmpfs,destination=/tmp/ram -e ELECTRON_BUILDER_TMP_DIR=/tmp/ram -e REDIS_ENDPOINT -e DEBUG -p 8443:443 --rm electronuserland/build-server
scripts.dist: yarn build && yarn build-router && yarn push && yarn push-router && yarn bundle
